ygData.subject: Re: Helping Nightlight/ Azure
ygData.msgSnippet: Yggdrasil: Yes, but there is a major risk; I suspect the Preds have already reprogrammed her. This means that she will not be the NightLight you ll have known.

Yggdrasil: Yes, but there is a major risk; I suspect the Preds have
already reprogrammed her. This means that she will not be the
NightLight you'll have known.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus moves his free hand to his chin, stroking it, while in
thought. He was also glad that Eliat had fallen asleep.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: So we get our Nightlight out without the Predacons
knowing, and leave the clone. Interesting. And it just may work...
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Yggdrasil: Before we do this, there
is something I want to suggest.
> However, you might not like it.
> 
> He straightened himself up and turned a holoprojector on.
> 
> Yggdrasil: We have part of Nightlight's spark. What I suggest we do is
> that we create a clone and replace the real Nightlight by the clone.
> We could also boobytrap the clone so as to make it a direct threat
> that would be right under the nose of the preds.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus, along with Elita, follows Yggdrasil to the other room.
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: So should we get these protective programs uploaded
> to my spark now?
> 
>
